author: AGSCogs
description: Fully featured activity‐management cog: define types, JSON‐templated embeds, join buttons, DM invites, voice‐call checks, games, hangouts, persistence, and more.
end_user_data_statement: Stores only activity definitions and instance state; no sensitive personal data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing AGSActivities! Use `[p]activitytype` to define types and `[p]activity` to start or manage activities.
